rundown: 6-5 W @ Detroit Tigers Joey Wentz: 5.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 6 hits, 0 HR, 7 strikeouts Batters: Nacho Alvarez Jr. (3 hits - 4 AB, 2 HR, 3 RBI) Drake Baldwin (1 hit - 3 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Jurickson Profar (1 hit - 4 AB, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a narrow victory against the Detroit Tigers, showcasing a strong offensive performance. Key highlights include Nacho Alvarez Jr.'s standout game with two home runs and three RBIs, contributing significantly to the team's run total. Drake Baldwin also made an impact with a home run and two RBIs. Despite allowing five runs, the Braves' pitching held strong enough to clinch the win. The game was tightly contested, with both teams trading blows, but the Braves managed to edge out the Tigers in the end.
